properties.areaDesc: Bibb, AL; Jefferson, AL; Shelby, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 11:14AM CST until February 12 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights Affecting Bibb...Jefferson and
Shelby Counties.

.A Flood Warning has been issued at Cahaba Heights due to expected
rainfall amounts between 4 and 6 inches through the day on Tuesday.
Additional heavy rainfall is possible through the end of this
upcoming week which will cause water levels to remain elevated or
increase further. Interests should closely monitor the latest river
forecasts through the upcoming week.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights.
* from Tuesday morning to Wednesday afternoon...or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At 10:30 AM Sunday The stage Was 3 feet.
* Flood stage is 14 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by late Tuesday morning and
continue to rise to near 17.2 feet by Tuesday evening. The river
will fall below flood stage by early Wednesday morning.
* Impact...At 17.0 feet...Flooding of some commercial property in
the area begins as stages continues to rise.
* Impact...At 20.0 feet...Water overflows the yards of some homes
near the river.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Monday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
